selections.name: Tricia's Rainbow
selections.reason: First starter by Gold Standard who looked sharp winning a trial at Scone on Jan 30. Local trainer and draws well enough to make an immediate impact.

selections.name: Leppitsch
selections.reason: Cavanough-trained colt who has shown promise in trials, placing 3rd at Muswellbrook. Profiles well for a bold debut run.

selections.name: Leuca
selections.reason: Has the benefit of race experience, finishing 4th at Newcastle last start. The inside barrier is a major plus.

selections.name: May The Force
selections.reason: Runner-up in a recent trial and draws a soft gate. Watch betting moves.

danger_horse.name: Leppitsch
danger_horse.reason: Strong stable and trial form suggests he will be right in the finish.

selections.name: Proclivity
selections.reason: Coming off a strong win at Gilgandra. Has upside and maps to get a good run. The one to beat.

selections.name: Lucky Ozzie
selections.reason: Consistent performer who placed 3rd last start at Beaumont. Proven at this level and draws well.

selections.name: Visualise
selections.reason: Finished 4th last start and has been competitive in similar grades. Solid each-way hope.

selections.name: Cascan
selections.reason: Improved effort to finish 3rd last start. Can add value to exotics.

danger_horse.name: Lucky Ozzie
danger_horse.reason: Consistent form makes him the main threat to the top pick.

selections.name: Magic Merlin
selections.reason: Excellent debut 2nd at Walcha. Strips fitter and looks the class runner of the field. Hard to beat.

selections.name: Miss Maverick
selections.reason: Ran a solid 2nd last start at Orange. Improving with racing and looks the main danger.

selections.name: Lite Side
selections.reason: Placed 3rd last start and has been consistent. Should be in the mix again.

selections.name: My Sweetheart
selections.reason: Runner-up last start and draws a perfect gate to get a soft run.

danger_horse.name: Miss Maverick
danger_horse.reason: Recent form suggests she is peaking and can challenge the favorite.

selections.name: Toke
selections.reason: Ran a decent 4th last start on heavy ground. Back on a good surface should suit. Consistent enough in a weak field.

selections.name: Zo Frilling
selections.reason: Finished 4th last start and has shown glimpses of ability. Chance in a wide-open race.

selections.name: Thirty Degrees
selections.reason: Not far away when 4th last start. Barrier is tricky but has claims.

selections.name: Second Swing
selections.reason: Resuming from a spell. Trialled recently and draws the inside. Watch market.

danger_horse.name: Zo Frilling
danger_horse.reason: Capable of improvement in this grade.

selections.name: Nation Changing
selections.reason: Resuming. Has a great record (2 wins from 4 starts). Trialled well at Scone. The one to beat if ready.

selections.name: Gelsey
selections.reason: Last start winner at Walcha. In good form and must be respected despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Snatchreilly
selections.reason: Runner-up last start and draws ideally in barrier 2. Will be in the finish.

selections.name: En Primeur
selections.reason: Coming off a win. Confidence is up and rates as a solid chance.

danger_horse.name: Gelsey
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is hard to knock, big threat.

selections.name: Dune And Dusted
selections.reason: Won the Lightning Handicap at Walcha last start, beating key rivals here. Weights favor him again relative to Rivkin.

selections.name: Rivkin
selections.reason: 2nd to Dune And Dusted last start. Meets him better at the weights but has a tricky barrier. Main danger.

selections.name: Inazuma Boy
selections.reason: Last start winner who draws the rails. Will be prominent for a long way.

selections.name: Cresta Run
selections.reason: 3rd in the key form race behind the top two selections. Honest runner.

danger_horse.name: Rivkin
danger_horse.reason: Swing in weights gives him a chance to turn the tables.

selections.name: Aimpoint
selections.reason: Drops in grade from a solid 6th at Canterbury. Class runner of the field and should prove too strong despite the weight.

selections.name: Otium
selections.reason: Finished 2nd in the Walcha Cup, beating Voracious. Racing well and looks a solid threat.

selections.name: Voracious
selections.reason: 3rd in the Walcha Cup. Consistent type who draws well and will be competitive.

selections.name: Fiorsum Fred
selections.reason: 3rd at Tamworth last start. Honest campaigner who is usually around the mark.

danger_horse.name: Otium
danger_horse.reason: Strong performance in the Cup last start puts him right in this.

selections.name: Silent Serenade
selections.reason: Broke maiden status with a convincing win last start. Lightly raced with upside and can handle the step up.

selections.name: Just Jacky
selections.reason: Won at this track and distance two starts back. Forgive last run; back to preferred conditions here.

selections.name: Mellencamp
selections.reason: Drops in class from BM64. Carries weight but has the ability to feature in this grade.

selections.name: Halle Bee
selections.reason: Placed 3rd last start. Consistent mare who should be included in exotics.

danger_horse.name: Just Jacky
danger_horse.reason: Proven track and distance winner who can bounce back.
